root: ^Ow! Why’d you hit me so hard!
^Because you’re the witch and I’m the royal knight!
^But I’m always playing the witch… no fair!
^I promise the next time I’ll let you be the knight, pinky promise.
^What are you two doing? It’s late, go to bed now, the both of you. I could hear you all the way from the living room.
^But siiis I was just about to play as the knight and fight witches for the first timmmeee.
^You could always play tomorrow, and I’ll join as well. Sounds good?
^I can't sleep... and my arm still hurts a little.
^...How about this, I'll play you my favourite song on the piano. It always calms me down, and I'm sure you'll like it too.
^Music won’t make my arm hurt any less…
^That’s true, but music always soothes the heart. And I hope you’ll understand that too.
^Use your Z, X, and C buttons to sweep away the little creatures coming at you! The more on beat you are to the red line, the higher your score will be!
